      • Room

        public Room(int roomID,
            Rectangle[] walls,
            RangedEnemy[] rangedEnemies,
            MeleeEnemy[] meleeEnemies,
            StationEnemy[] stationEnemies,
            HealthBooster[] boosters)
        Creates a custom Room object with a roomID, walls, rangedEnemies, meleeEnemies, stationEnemies, and boosters
        Parameters:
        roomID - the type of room
        walls - the walls in this room
        rangedEnemies - the RangedEnemies in this room
        meleeEnemies - the RangedEnemies in this room
        stationEnemies - the RangedEnemies in this room
        boosters - the health boosters within this room

      • draw

        public void draw(DrawingSurface drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage floor,
                 processing.core.PImage obstacle,
                 processing.core.PImage rEUp,
                 processing.core.PImage rEDown,
                 processing.core.PImage rERight,
                 processing.core.PImage rELeft,
                 processing.core.PImage eBullet,
                 processing.core.PImage attack,
                 processing.core.PImage leftMeleeGoblin)
        Draws the floor, the structures, the enemies, and the bullets
        Parameters:
        drawer - the drawer object that draws everything
        floor - the image of the floor to be drawn
        obstacle - the image of the obstacles to be drawn
        rEUp - the image of the enemy when facing up to be drawn
        rEDown - the image of the enemy when facing down to be drawn
        rERight - the image of the enemy when facing right to be drawn
        rELeft - the image of the enemy when facing left to be drawn
        eBullet - the image of the enemies bullets to be drawn
        leftMeleeGoblin - the image of the MeleeEnemy facing left
        attack - the attack image of the MeleeEnemy facing left

        Returns:
